item.title: Report: Nevada Investigates 180 Cases of Double-Voting, Hundreds More Potential 2024 Election Violations

item.title: 3 Million ‘Temporary’ Migrants Could Sway Congressional Seats Thanks To Census Bureau Change
item.description: A Census Bureau change enables blue states to keep congressional seats because their population is propped up with illegal aliens.
